name: Vite + Tailwind + shadcn/ui
description: Fast single-page applications with Vite, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui. Optimized for rapid development and lightning-fast hot module replacement.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Modern, dynamic design that embraces creativity while maintaining usability. Perfect for startups, portfolios, and interactive applications.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Vibrant purple primary with complementary accent colors. Use gradients sparingly for visual interest. Maintain readability with proper contrast.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Leverage Vite's fast refresh for rapid iteration. Use shadcn/ui components with custom color themes. Consider micro-interactions for engagement.
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: Maintain WCAG 2.1 AA standards. Ensure animations respect prefers-reduced-motion. Test with screen readers.
